channel.title: Ummah.build Islamic Tech Ideas
channel.description: Open source Islamic tech ideas: prayer tools, mosque apps, zakat, Quran, Ramadan, Islamic finance.

item.title: ü§≤ PRAYSAP

item.title: üìú ShariaConvert
item.description: Automatically convert legal documents into Sharia-compliant ones. Convert any conventional contract into a Shariah-compliant version in minutes. Built with privacy-first architecture ‚Äî all processing happens locally in your browser. ‚Ä¢ Convert any conventional contract into a Shariah-compliant version in minutes ‚Ä¢ Privacy-first architecture ‚Äî all processing happens locally in your browser ‚Ä¢ Contract Editor ‚Äî Markdown-based dual-pane editor with live preview ‚Ä¢ Compliance Analyzer ‚Äî Automatic detection of Shariah violations (riba, gharar, maysir) ‚Ä¢ Template Library ‚Äî pre-built Shariah-compliant contract templates
